kobe.KBtelescope.telescope.set_telname¶

telescope.set_telname(self, telname)¶

set telescope name

Parameters
namestring

input a telescope name

namemax: `int`

if not telescope name given, construct with an interger number number selected from 0 tp namemax

sn_data_analysis: sdapy
